title: FS - Two Little Monsters To Attract Your Attention
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: FS - Two Little Monsters To Attract Your Attention
posts.post_content:
1.  Frank LaPorte - attractively entombed in a BVG 2.5 holder for $32 shipped
2.  Boss Schmidt - hard to find a more attractive card in a PSA 2 holder.  I wont say its undergraded, but it really is, SOLD
3.  Roger Bresnahan - formerly attracted someone's attention, this HOFer is well loved with character in every crease.  It only looks 200 years old SOLD
4.  Chief Bender (after the fire) No Trees - should attract HOF collectors SOLD
5.  "Happy Jack" Chesbro - the final attraction is a nice looking card that measures a tad short, but this HOFer was only 5'9" for $48 shipped

Twist my arm and take LaPorte & Chesbro for $75 shipped

Bender is definitely sold.
Schmidt is definitely sold.

Chesbro, LaPorte and Bresnahan are availalbe.

Thanks for the interest and sales.

Frank
Only two left and they're both Highlanders.
